%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stmanualjournals_tmp
AS
SELECT

    ojdt.refdate as sap_manualjournalsheader_postingdate
    ,ojdt.duedate as sap_manualjournalsheader_duedate
    ,ojdt.loctotal as sap_manualjournalsheader_doctotal
    ,COALESCE(ojdt.doctype,'M') as sap_manualjournalsheader_doctype
    ,ojdt.transid as sap_manualjournalsheader_transid
    ,jdt1.line_id as sap_manualjournalsline_linenum
    ,jdt1.account as sap_manualjournalsline_acctcode
    ,ojdt.transtype as sap_manualjournalsheader_objtype
    ,jdt1.project as sap_manualjournalsline_project
    ,jdt1.vatgroup as sap_manualjournalsline_vatgroup
    ,jdt1.vatrate as sap_manualjournalsline_vatrate
    ,jdt1.vatamount as sap_manualjournalsline_vatamount
    ,jdt1.linememo as sap_manualjournalsline_description
    ,jdt1.ref1 as sap_manualjournalsline_jnlref1
    ,jdt1.ref2 as sap_manualjournalsline_jnlref2
    ,jdt1.u_depot as sap_manualjournalsline_subdepotcode
    ,jdt1.credit as sap_manualjournalsline_credit --REMOVE IN SUB TABLES
    ,jdt1.debit as sap_manualjournalsline_debit --REMOVE IN SUB TABLES
    -- ,as sap_manualjournalsline_linetotal
    -- ,as  sap_manualjournalsline_doccat
    -- ,si.sap_salesinvoiceline_itemcode as sap_manualjournalsline_itemcode
    -- ,as sap_manualjournalsheader_cardcode
    -- ,as sap_manualjournalsheader_cardref
    -- ,i.sap_item_invntitem as sap_manualjournalsline_invntitem

    ,ojdt.memo as sap_manualjournalsheader_memo
    ,coa.sap_account_groupmask
    ,coa.sap_account_acctname
    ,coa.sap_account_segment_0
    ,coa.sap_account_segment_1
    ,coa.sap_account_segment_2
    ,coa.sap_account_level1name

FROM dboOJDT ojdt
LEFT JOIN dboJDT1 jdt1 on jdt1.transid = ojdt.transid
LEFT JOIN stchartofaccounts coa on coa.sap_account_acctcode = jdt1.account
stmanualjournals_tmp = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM stmanualjournals_tmp")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
stpurchasepricevariance
AS
SELECT
    sap_manualjournalsheader_postingdate
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_duedate
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_doctotal
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_doctype
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_transid
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_linenum
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_acctcode
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_objtype
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_project
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_vatgroup
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_vatrate
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_vatamount
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_description
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_jnlref1
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_jnlref2
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_subdepotcode
    ,SUM(sap_manualjournalsline_credit-sap_manualjournalsline_debit)as sap_manualjournalsline_linetotal
    ,'purchasepricevariance' as  sap_manualjournalsline_doccat

    -- ,si.sap_salesinvoiceline_itemcode as sap_manualjournalsline_itemcode
    -- ,as sap_manualjournalsheader_cardcode
    -- ,as sap_manualjournalsheader_cardref
    -- ,i.sap_item_invntitem as sap_manualjournalsline_invntitem

FROM stmanualjournals_tmp
WHERE sap_manualjournalsline_acctcode =  '_SYS00000010296'
AND UPPER(LEFT(sap_manualjournalsheader_memo, 8)) <> 'YEAR END'
GROUP BY
    sap_manualjournalsheader_postingdate
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_duedate
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_doctotal
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_doctype
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_transid
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_linenum
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_acctcode
    ,sap_manualjournalsheader_objtype
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_project
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_vatgroup
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_vatrate
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_vatamount
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_description
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_jnlref1
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_jnlref2
    ,sap_manualjournalsline_subdepotcode
stpurchasepricevariance = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM stpurchasepricevariance")

stpurchasepricevariance = stpurchasepricevariance.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsheader_postingdate","sap_purchasepricevarianceheader_postingdate")\
.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsheader_duedate","sap_purchasepricevarianceheader_duedate")\
.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsheader_doctotal","sap_purchasepricevarianceheader_doctotal")\
.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsheader_doctype","sap_purchasepricevarianceheader_doctype")\
.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsheader_transid","sap_purchasepricevarianceheader_transid")\
.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsline_linenum","sap_purchasepricevarianceline_linenum")\

.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsheader_objtype","sap_purchasepricevarianceheader_objtype")\
.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsline_project","sap_purchasepricevarianceline_project")\
.withColumnRenamed("sap_manualjournalsline_vatgroup","sap_purchasepricevarianceline_vatgroup")\
